'''Andrew''' was the name of [[Aurora]]'s boyfriend, though she already had a husband ([[Rick (Aroura's husband)|Rick]]), a boyfriend ([[Ethan]]), and was also seeing [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]]. He is never seen.
